skills.title: Engineering
skills.description: I wrote my first line of code at 12. I went on to study computer science theory and competed in international programming competitions. I love exploring different stacks, from research to founding a startup. I have recently been exploring formal verification methods and smart contract engineering.

skills.title: Teams
skills.description: I recognized early that to really build impactful tech, you need impactful teams. I pride myself in being able to evaluate talent, inspire exceptional engineers, and work together on ambitious timelines.
notableWork: Managing team and solo research projects @ MIT

skills.title: Growth
skills.description: From trading and bot-building in high school to eventually planning the growth of my own companies, I've loved identifying opportunities for growth. Sometimes this is financial, but other times it is about growing communities or growing products.
